channel.title: Client/Server
channel.description: Does anyone have an idea of a server and client that's somewhat blank without a bunch of useless methods that will be good for a beginner coder to use. I just want something where I can add my own touch to it from the start but I don't want to start from a sloppy server or client. Plus I wanted to know if there is a program I should download to help me code, I've heard people talking about something called an IDE or something like that and I was just wondering if I should use something like this. Thanks

item.title: Client/Server
item.dc:creator: @RealmofTerror RealmofTerror
item.description:
@RealmofTerror wrote:

I do have a question, with the 317 deob anytime I try to log onto a server it says unexpected response from server please try another world. How can I fix that?

Read full topic

item.title: Client/Server
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“Primadude, post:7, topic:372123”][quote author=Ashton51 link=topic=468175.msg3422845#msg3422845 date=1291665129]

Well i just got the hyperion, 317 deob, and NetBeans. So I’m going to try and see what I can do with what I have ^^ Thanks everyone, especially Primadude that was a lot of useful information. I will try to either make a new topic or update this one to let you guys know how it’s going.

Tbh,

Eclipse is my favorite IDE, I’m using it to develop Android applications but i just use Notepad++ for toying around with private servers.

Not sure if an IDE is of much use for programming private servers.
[/quote]

I use both Eclipse and NetBeans, and they’re both great IDEs.

An IDE is useful for developing any Java program.[/quote]

True,

I just don’t take private servers that seriously rofl.

Read full topic

item.title: Client/Server
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

For a server i’d recommend downloading one from the Base Servers thread in the Downloads section, located here. Hyperion is the popular choice out of those listed servers, and also the most recently made, so i’d recommend using it - It may be hard to understand a server like this, but using a Winterlove-based server will give you bad programming habits.

For a clean client, I’d recommend using the 317 “deob”; it’s the untouched version of the 317 client. I’ve uploaded it for you to download, here.

An IDE (Integrated Development Environment) is a program that will aid you greatly in programming applications - in this case, you’ll be using a Java IDE. The most popular three Java IDEs are:

[ul][li]Eclipse - Downloads page.[/li]
[li]NetBeans - Downloads page.[/li]
[li]IntelliJ IDEA - Downloads page.[/li][/ul]

Hope I helped ;).

Read full topic

some may be pretty rubbish,but by correcting them,you learn to code.
Also,download zodiacs region pack?
Good luck with this,update this topic/or make a new one with updates on how your going:)

Read full topic

But a beginner would probally be BlankScape.
